SELECT CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, a.id AS activity_id, a.name AS activity_name, date_format( ap.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( ap.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN apt.max_time >=#{endTime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END state FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apm.activity_plan_id AND ap.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apt.machine_id,MAX(ap.end_time) AS max_time FROM inno72_activity_plan ap LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apt ON apt.activity_plan_id=ap.id WHERE ap.is_delete =0 GROUP BY apt.machine_id ) apt on m.id=apt.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity a ON a.id = ap.activity_id and a.is_delete = 0 WHERE m.machine_status = '4' and machine_type !=2 AND m.id = #{machineId}
AND (l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' )

SELECT CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, t.id AS activity_id, t.name AS activity_name, date_format( mt.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( mt.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN mm.max_time >=#{endTime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END state FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON mt.interact_machine_id = im.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact t ON t.id = im.interact_id and t.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT machine_id,MAX(mt.end_time) AS max_time FROM inno72_interact_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON m.id=mt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact t ON t.id = m.interact_id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.`status`!=2 GROUP BY m.machine_id ) mm on m.id=mm.machine_id WHERE m.machine_status = '4' and machine_type !=2
AND (l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' )

SELECT CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, im.query_start_time, im.query_end_time, t.id AS activity_id, t.name AS activity_name, date_format( mt.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( mt.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN mm.max_time >=im.query_end_time and im.state =0 THEN -1 ELSE im.state END state FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.machine_id = m.id AND im.interact_id = #{interactId} LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine imt ON imt.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON mt.interact_machine_id = imt.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact t ON t.id = imt.interact_id AND t.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mm.machine_id,MAX(mm.time) AS max_time from ( SELECT machine_id,MAX(mt.end_time) AS time FROM inno72_interact_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON m.id=mt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact t ON t.id = m.interact_id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.`status`!=2 and m.machine_id is not NULL and m.interact_id !=#{interactId} GROUP BY m.machine_id UNION SELECT apt.machine_id,MAX(ap.end_time) AS time FROM inno72_activity_plan ap LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apt ON apt.activity_plan_id=ap.id WHERE ap.is_delete =0 and apt.machine_id is not NULL GROUP BY apt.machine_id ) mm GROUP BY machine_id ) mm on m.id=mm.machine_id
WHERE m.machine_status = '4' and machine_type !=2 AND m.id = #{machineId}

SELECT im.id, CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, m.machine_code, m.id AS machine_id FROM inno72_interact_machine im LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code WHERE im.interact_id = #{interactId}
AND (l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' )

SELECT im.machine_id FROM inno72_interact_machine_time imt LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact i ON i.id = im.interact_id WHERE i.is_delete =0 AND i.`status` != 2 and im.interact_id = #{id} and im.interact_id != #{noId}
and ( imt.start_time <= #{endTime} AND imt.end_time >= #{startTime} )

SELECT machine_id FROM inno72_activity_plan ap LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.activity_plan_id = ap.id where is_delete =0 and ap.id = #{id} and ap.id != #{noId}
and ( ap.start_time <= #{endTime} AND ap.end_time >= #{startTime} )
